subtitle: A lovely medley of summer vegetables that can be prepared ahead when entertaining.

method.text: Place the aubergines in a shallow dish. Sprinkle over the salt and leave for 30 min. Rinse the salt from the aubergines and pat dry on kitchen towel.
Preheat oven to 190°C. Lightly grease a rectangular ovenproof dish.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan or wok and fry gently the onion, garlic, fennel, courgettes, thyme and aubergines for 8-10 min or until softened slightly.
Remove from heat. Carefully put in the ovenproof dish, arranging diagonally in layers with the tomato slices, to form a mosaic effect.

In a bowl, whisk together the seasoning, cider vinegar, olive oil and basil. Pour over the vegetables. Cover with foil. Cook in the oven for 25 min. Remove foil and cook for a further 10 min or until soft. Garnish with sprigs of fresh basil.

title: Mediterranean vegetable mosaic
